column6: - Loki heads back to the dawn of Asgard to join its greatest heroes on a quest for an otter-skin of gold, the heart's-blood of a dragon... and a certain magical sword. - Meanwhile, Loki does not appear in this issue. - Both these statements are, for once, true.
column8: | writer:Al Ewing | penciller (cover):Jenny Frison | artist:Lee Garbett
